seq_server module¶

seq_server.cast_args(args)¶

Modifies the dictionary received in parameter by trying to cast the values in the required type. The required types are stored in the configuration file.

Parameters:

args – dict with keys: param name, values: param in

Returns:

0 if there was no error and 1 otherwise

seq_server.seq_server()¶

receive commands in string form through a socket. format them into a dictionary. create a thread to execute the command.

Returns:

KalAO-ICS
